org.libav

Interface ITimestampGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CopyTimestampGenerator

    public interface ITimestampGenerator
    Interface for timestamp generator classes.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getInputOffset()
      Get offset for input timestamps.
      long getLastTimestamp()
      Get last generated timestamp.
      long nextFrame(long inputTimestamp)
      Get timestamp for the next frame.
      void reset()
      Reset the generated sequence.
      void setInputOffset(long offset)
      Set offset for input timestamps.

    • Method Detail

      • nextFrame

        long nextFrame(long inputTimestamp)
        Get timestamp for the next frame. It is a value between the last generated timestamp and the input timestamp - offset or -1 if the input timestamp - offset is less or equal to the last generated timestamp. NOTE: Call this metod multiple times until the returned value is < 0.
        Parameters:
        inputTimestamp - an input timestamp
        Returns:
        timestamp for the next frame

      • getLastTimestamp

        long getLastTimestamp()
        Get last generated timestamp.
        Returns:
        last timestamp

      • setInputOffset

        void setInputOffset(long offset)
        Set offset for input timestamps.
        Parameters:
        offset - an offset

      • getInputOffset

        long getInputOffset()
        Get offset for input timestamps.
        Returns:
        offset

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the generated sequence.
